name: Harmon Media Group
overview:
Harmon Media Group prides itself on technical competence and good, clean design. We strive for a balance between the technical and creative - both the front and the back-end of website design and web application development.

Harmon Media Group, Inc. was incorporated in 2004 by Principal Director, Charles Harmon with a vision to merge clean web design with cutting-edge web programming. We specialize in CSS web design, database integration and custom web development.

As part of our web development offering, we build custom online payment solutions for projects that need to seamlessly integrate with existing websites.

Too often, off-the-shelf shopping carts do not inspire confidence in potential customers and sales are lost. We have experience in developing everything from single page custom payment forms to web-based invoicing programs for mid-sized utility companies.
